sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Treasury Related to Administration of Michigan Educational Assessment to the Superintendent of Public Instruction by Type II Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Assessment Governing Board to Superintendent of Public Instruction by Type I
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Treasury Related to Administration of Michigan Educational Assessment to the Superintendent of Public Instruction by Type II Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Assessment Governing Board to Superintendent of Public Instruction by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties of Merit Award Board to Superintendent of Public Instruction by Type II Transfer; Rescission of Executive Order No. 2000-11.
